results.title: Simvastatin protection against acute immune-mediated glomerulonephritis in mice.
results.text_hl: The reversibility of benefit was evaluated by the administration of @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonic acid@@@ along with nephrotoxic serum (NTS) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ The severity of the acute @DISEASE_Nephritis @DISEASE_MESH:D009393 @@@nephritis@@@, including @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@, elevated BUN, and histologic changes, was ameliorated in a dose-dependent manner, when @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ was administered either prior to NTS injection or at the time of NTS injection.

citations.NLM: Christensen M, Su AW, Snyder RW, Greco A, Lipschutz JH, Madaio MP. Simvastatin protection against acute immune-mediated glomerulonephritis in mice. Kidney Int. 2006 Feb;69(3):457-63. PMID: 16407885

results.title: Hyperbaric oxygen treatment augments the efficacy of cilazapril and simvastatin regimens in an experimental nephrotic syndrome model.
results.text_hl: Superoxide dismutase (SOD) (beta = -0.381, p = 0.02) and GPx (beta = -0.509, p < 0.001) were independently related to @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ levels. Both @CHEMICAL_Cilazapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017315 @@@cilazapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly improved GPx, SOD, PCO, and @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@.

results.title: Potential therapeutic effect of simvastatin on progressive renal failure and nephrotic-range proteinuria caused by renal cholesterol embolism.
results.text_hl: Progressive @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ and @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic@@@-range @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ were halted just after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Effect of combining ACE inhibitor and statin in severe experimental nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Even at the high dose @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ failed to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ only partially affected @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@.

results.title: [Simvastatin therapy and effect on hiperlipidemia and vascular status in nephrotic children with sustained dyslipidemia].
results.text_hl: Tolerance of simvastation was very good in all cases but one. CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ therapy was effective and safe in @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic@@@ non-@<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuric@@@ children with abnormal @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile.
